So you got a job in channel management...

Allbound is an innovative SaaS platform that simplifies and accelerates your ability to recruit, onboard, measure and grow your partners.As the CTO, I lead a great team of developers and designers who are a building a scalable, flexible,  API-first platform.

I teach design and business to an ambitious and talented group of up-and-coming designers and developers. While we spend a fair amount of our time on the technical and tactical aspects of the web, the true focus is helping students become modern-day problem solvers who bring value to the marketplace.Courses Taught: DDN300 - Web Design 1DDN355 - Content  Management SystemsDDN400 - Business for the Design Professional

IDS Technology Marketing is a business-to-business (B2B) marketing agency whose purpose is to help technology companies success through smart, impactful marketing and sales.At IDS, I lead a great team of designers, developers, marketers and thinkers. My job, simply put, was to enable success of the team who, in turn, help technology companies succeed.

At IDS, in this role, I worked closely with the company leadership - as I moved from developer to director - to more clearly structure our services offerings, our team composition and the systems needed to enable success.

I joined a small marketing team of a digital security firm as they looked to reshape their brand and grow market share. As the technical lead, I oversaw the renewed focused on marketing automation within the business model and led the transition from Marketo to Eloqua (a portfolio sister company at the time).

My education was greatest outside of the classroom, with great mentors, focusing on technological shifts in media, publishing and information sharing in general. As the result of their investment in me, I won an internship at The Poynter Institute for Media Studies and learned directly from Mario Garcia, the godfather of modern media design.

August 4, 2017, Kyle was senior to Jen but didn’t manage directly

"Yes, and ..." If there's one thing I've learned from working with Kyle, it's that anything is possible. A problem is only a problem until you solve it, and Kyle's mantra is to find the simplest path to success. He gets excited about possibilities and is ridiculously optimistic, but he also remains grounded in reality. Kyle is a coach and a mentor to many because he listens and because he's constantly trying to better himself through his personal interactions. Also ... Kyle is flat out fun. Like, really, really fun. I laughed nearly every day I worked with Kyle, and I absolutely love him for that.

June 18, 2017, Kyle was Sara’s teacher

I had the pleasure of teaching a couple of Sara's college courses and very much enjoyed my time with her. Sara's is a talented and driven 3D modeler. She' a calming presence, a great listener, and quick with a laugh. She is a smart, logical thinker and an avid consumer of information. Heck, Sara will read more books in a week than I will in a year. What's more, she will pass those books along to others through her community book-sharing program. Can you imagine the exponential power of this equation? It's impressive. For all of this and more, I'm a big fan of Sara's and trust that you will be too.

summary: I'm purpose-driven and self-motivated leader and teacher. I love to meet smart people, design and build neat and purposeful systems in a team-based environment, share knowledge, and get some laughs.I have more than 20 years in technology development, focusing on marketing and sales enablement  for the enterprise. In that time, I have written systems and led teams that supported such major brands as Dell, Oracle, Cisco, Starwood Hotels and New Times (now Village Voice).
